name: Willy Weak Leg
description:
Willy Weak Leg is my submussion for the Mini Jam 101: Limit. The limitation was 'Control The Environment'. I came up with a fun idea but had very little time to make some levels. So see this only as a prototype for a future game. Let me know what you think and I like to receive suggestions!

Controls: A, D to move, spacebar to jump

Credits:

cat planet studio
